list_definition.definition: (sometimes round about) near (in place, time, size etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The nearest town is about five miles away
The meeting took place at (round) about six o’clock
The box is just about big enough.

list_definition.definition: in different directions; here and there

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The children were running about (the garden)
She was rushing about the house trying to find her car keys.

list_definition.definition: in or on some part (of a place etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: You’ll find him somewhere about (the office).
She wore a coat about her shoulders
He lay with his clothes scattered about.
